Abstract: Technical Education- License Renewal for Campus Management software for 3 years & Purchase of workstations (2 Nos) for Government Engineering College Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad- Administrative sanction accorded - Orders issued.
Order Issued By:
(By order of the Governor)
C AJAYAN
Body Para: As per letters read above, the Director of Technical Education has forwarded proposals for License Renewal for Campus Management software for 3 years & Purchase of workstations (2 Nos) for Government Engineering College, Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad and has requested to accord Administrative Sanction.  2. The Departmental Working Group which met on 19.10.2020 considered the above proposals and has recommended to accord Administrative sanction, as per the minutes read as 3rd paper above.  3. In the aforesaid circumstances, Government are pleased to accord Administrative Sanction for Government Engineering College Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad, as detailed  below:
References:
1. Letter No.D3/8867/20/DTE dated 07.10.2020 from the Director of Technical Education.
2. Letter No.D3/19765/20/DTE dated 07.10.2020 from the Director of Technical Education.
3. Minutes of the Working Group meeting held on 19.10.2020.
